snippet: With my mother’s letter to my new baby girl, several worlds converge in the strange fluorescent dimness.
abstract: Jesse Wegman Editorial Observer describes experience of reading letter written by his deceased mother to his 6-day-old daughter as she lay in neonatal intensive care unit; recounts realization that some of letter's words were those of Dumbledore character in Harry Potter books, and describes how his mother came to resemble character toward end of her life.
lead_paragraph: With my mother’s letter to my new baby girl, several worlds converge in the strange fluorescent dimness.
